document.full_text: u.s. drugmaker merck & co is close to striking a marketing alliance with sun pharmaceutical industries ltd for the indian market, the mint reported on monday.
document.title: merck, sun pharma eye india marketing tie-up: report
lines_and_colors: u.s. drugmaker merck & co is close to striking a marketing alliance with sun pharmaceutical industries ltd for the indian market, the mint reported on monday.
